item.description: Every Saturday in Salem, one of my favorite stores Pamplemousse (French word for grapefruit) has wine and mead tasting for FREE! We will sample different adult beverages and have some snacks...After, I will give the group a free guided tour (I work for Salem Historical Tours), and then we will end for dinner at one of Salem's awesome restaurants...More information to follow!
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be waiting by the front door
item.name: Wine & Mead Tasting, Tour and Dinner in Salem
